title: Delivery Lead- BA
content:
We are currently looking for a Delivery Lead  to help manage deliverables, tasks, and stakeholders from an operational and production perspective. Within this role, you will need to make sure that we service our clients with the highest level of quality and consistency while maintaining a happy team and healthy operational results. Successful candidates for this opportunity will demonstrate strategic thought beyond day-to-day project management.
 
Role & Project management

As the Delivery Lead, you’ll sit in the senior leadership team and be responsible for the excellent delivery of all of our work. This role analyzes and improves organizational processes, and works to safeguard quality, productivity and efficiency throughout our production cycles.
You’ll deep dive into the client universe to truly understand business needs, identify pain points and map a fitting way to operationalize our team to deliver.
Your focus will be on quality and efficiency and together with our account and production teams, you’ll help to shape new workstreams and the teams associated with them.
You’ll bring all our in-house talents together to make sure great work is produced, in addition to overseeing processes to scale talent as needed.
You’ll be responsible for resourcing against budgets to ensure we can deliver work at speed, and drive overall project profitability - establishing what gets done and when to make sure projects are profitable and doable, with realistic targets and deadlines.
You’ll focus on scalability by creating training documentation, tools, training sessions, train the trainer workshops and investigate automation where possible.
And don’t forget, you’re here to tell us how this work, we want you to make this the best running team in MediaMonks, tell us what needs to happen because we need you to evaluate the good, the bad and the ugly of finished projects to improve our processes and work streams.

 
Workflow & Processes

Audit and streamline processes and help to improve them in collaboration with the client.
Help nurture a positive learning environment for the team. 
Solve logistical challenges to make sure that makers can produce at full speed and great quality. 
Support the creation of documentation and training materials so we can get better with every go. 

 
Team & Talent management

Support the on-boarding of new team members to new projects within your scope of work and supervision.
Nurture our culture by organizing inspirational or training events and keep an eye on talent happiness.
You are in the lead of facilitating the review moments with your team.

 
Account

You’ll liaise between several MM offices and our team in BA to make sure we nail milestones and deadlines. Gain visibility with the global operations team. .
You support the Producers and Business lead in their day-to-day management by good understanding of all processes, including the financial perspective to understand the role for every resource from core to fix. 
Help define production strategies, write up workflows and dig deep into tooling and software.

About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.

At Media.Monks, we believe in fostering an environment where a diversity of perspectives can thrive. We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve. We welcome and encourage qualified applicants, from all backgrounds, who are excited to contribute to our mission. 

As a step in strengthening our hiring process, we invite you to voluntarily provide information that will help inform and improve our inclusion efforts.

As a reminder, answering this question is entirely voluntary. Your response will remain confidential and intended solely for the purpose of improving our hiring process; and will not, in any way, be associated with your specific application or be used in the hiring decision.
